alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 21 at 10:36AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 230 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1035 AM ChST, Satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
